items.title: Welcome to LunarTick Trading
items.summary: LunarTick Trading is where I publish any indicators that I have developed for various trading platforms including NinjaTrader, MotiveWave and TradingView. The source code for all free indicators listed on this site can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
LunarTick Trading is where I publish any indicators that I have developed for various trading platforms including NinjaTrader, MotiveWave and TradingView.

The source code for all free indicators listed on this site can be found on GitHub.

items.title: Signals MA
items.summary: Shows buy/sell signals when price crosses a Moving Average. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows buy/sell signals when price crosses a Moving Average.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: Real Open/Close
items.summary: Shows the real Open/Close price levels on each candle, especially useful for Heiken Ashi candles. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows the real Open/Close price levels on each candle, especially useful for Heiken Ashi candles.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: MA Cloud Dots
items.summary: Shows a row of colored dots indicating the color of the MA Cloud indicator. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows a row of colored dots indicating the color of the MA Cloud indicator.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: MA Cloud
items.summary: Shows a cloud formed by highlighting the region between two moving averages. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows a cloud formed by highlighting the region between two moving averages.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: Laguerre RSI
items.summary: The Laguerre RSI oscillator, supporting both the regular Laguerre RSI calculation and a variation with fractal energy. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
The Laguerre RSI oscillator, supporting both the regular Laguerre RSI calculation and a variation with fractal energy.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: Heiken Ashi Dots
items.summary: Shows a row of colored dots indicating the color of Heiken Ashi candles, with an intermediate color indicating a change in the Heiken Ashi color. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows a row of colored dots indicating the color of Heiken Ashi candles, with an intermediate color indicating a change in the Heiken Ashi color.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.

items.title: ADX Dots
items.summary: Shows a row of colored dots indicating trend strength according to the ADX indicator. The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
items.content_html:
Shows a row of colored dots indicating trend strength according to the ADX indicator.

The source code for all NinjaTrader indicators listed on this page can be found on GitHub.
